metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6865 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: `EncryptingOutputStream` was susceptible to exposing uninitialized data.This issue could only be abused in order to write data to a local diskwhich may have implications for private browsing mode. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox ESR < 115.6 and Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
